document.full_text: a moscow court on monday refused a parole request by mikhail b. khodorkovsky, the jailed former oil tycoon, citing a lack of proper paperwork.
document.title: europe: russia: parole denied for ex-tycoon; paperwork cited
lines_and_colors: a moscow court on monday refused a parole request by mikhail b. khodorkovsky, the jailed former oil tycoon, citing a lack of proper paperwork.
